page.title: 08 LEISURE & HOBBIES.
page.content:
Out of 231 replies only 2 stated that they had no hobbies. The hobbies listed, clearly reflected the country nature of our block.Gardening was the most popular (46) with various forms of needlework next(27),The list shows the 25 most popular ones.
Angling. Birdwatching. Cars. Bridge Computing. Dogs. Cookery Electronics. Toc.H. Singing Handicrafts. Chess Photography. Dancing Gardening. Driving Needlework. D.I.Y. Philately. Music. Out-door Sports. Reading. Flower Arranging. Theatre. Natural History.
